text: mee mo ana gau ngalua aamua gu hagamaanadu bolo ginaadou gaa hai nia wai gi hagalee hali gi di waahale belee hai digau Assyria gii hai nadau wai ai i di madagoaa digaula ma ga hoohoo mai gi Jerusalem. Nia gau ngalua aamua guu dagi nia daangada dogologo gi daha mo Jerusalem, guu pono nia monowai uwa aga huogodoo gi dee hali, malaa, nia wai gu hagalee hali mai i lodo nia gowaa aalaa.
